TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 长穗柄薹草 ( 原变种) chang sui bing tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Culms 40–70 cm tall. Lower spikes with slender peduncle, upper spikes with short peduncle. Fl. and fr. Jun–Aug.
treatment.distribution: Grasslands on mountain slopes, riversides; 1200–1300 m. Hubei, Sichuan, Yunnan [India, Indonesia, Nepal].
